sentences.en: ...a series of economic reforms to reactivate the economy.
sentences.cn: ...一系列旨在复苏经济的经济改革。

sentences.en: Conclusion: These experimental observations demonstrate the potential of immunosuppression to reactivate after resolution of infection.
sentences.cn: 结论: 这些实验观察说明,免疫抑制有激活已经控制的HB感染的潜在可能.请神农草版主按中英文对照格式发贴.

sentences.en: It was also agreed to reactivate two joint committees on negotiations.
sentences.cn: 磋商中还达成了重启两个联委会的决议。

sentences.en: Remote Hull Repairers are now available to reactivate incapacitated structures.
sentences.cn: 远程船体修理器现在可用于修理受损的已建筑.

sentences.en: Remove and replace worn components and reactivate system.
sentences.cn: 移除和更换磨损部件和恢复系统.

sentences.en: Scientists can now clone cells and reactivate genes.
sentences.cn: 科学家现在可以克隆细胞和活化基因.

sentences.en: They are trying their best to reactivate the old coal cutter.
sentences.cn: 他们正在尽最大的努力使这台旧截煤机重新运转.

sentences.en: They can enhance otherwise mild infections and may reactivate latent viruses.
sentences.cn: 它们能增强轻微传染,还能活化潜伏病毒.

sentences.en: Vitamin B 5 can increase the inherit tenacity of the hair and fully reactivate the exanimate hair.
sentences.cn: 维他命原B5能够加强头发的内在韧性,使原来缺乏生气的头发显得活力十足.

trans.tran_en: to make something start working again
